report.title: Transects list
report.description: A list of the transects for a survey
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples tr -- transects JOIN surveys su ON su.id=tr.survey_id AND tr.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values ref on ref.sample_id=tr.id and ref.deleted=false and ref.sample_attribute_id=#transect_id_attr_id# JOIN sample_attribute_values tp on tp.sample_id=tr.id and tp.deleted=false and tp.sample_attribute_id=#sample_type_attr_id# JOIN cache_termlists_terms ttype on ttype.id=tp.int_value #joins# WHERE tr.deleted=false AND tr.parent_id = #parent_sample_id# AND #website_filter#

param.name: sample_type_attr_id
param.description: Attribute ID for the sample type

param.name: transect_id_attr_id
param.description: Sample attribute ID for the transect ID
